items.content_html: TypeSwift is a lightweight and user-friendly text expander tool that aims to enhance your typing experience. It allows you to create and utilize custom keyboard shortcuts for frequently used phrases and expressions, significantly reducing your typing time and effort.

It allows you to create and utilize custom keyboard shortcuts for frequently used phrases and expressions, significantly reducing your typing time and effort.

items.content_html: Fetcher-Kit is a lightweight React library that simplifies asynchronous request management and data retrieval from APIs. This kit provides a useFetch hook that streamlines the handling of loading, error, and success states while seamlessly integrating with your React components.

This kit provides a useFetch hook that streamlines the handling of loading, error, and success states while seamlessly integrating with your React components.
